Text:
I had a problem showing mpg with subtitles on my ps3.. without the subs it was no problem but with it it went into superspeed the first min and everything went out of sync.. 

I searched the web and found other guys who had the same problem with mpg's so i tried to demux the video and audio data from the mpgs and remux them into a mkv and when i tried to watch that it just said "corrupted data" or something :S

Love all ur torrents.
thanks so much
very good quality
great for the ps3
will seed as much as poss
:-D
